title: Regal Panakala Haaram: Emerald and Diamond Grandeur
materials: varying sizes). Featuring signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A striking Panakala Haaram featuring five prominent square-cut emeralds, each meticulously framed by a halo of sparkling Polki diamonds. The design is further enhanced with interspersed Polki diamond accents, adding a touch of ethereal charm. The links are intricately crafted in gold, offering both flexibility and durability. The overall design marries traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern sensibility.
occasions: or milestone anniversaries. A magnificent statement piece for brides during muhurtham or for any special occasion where you want to exude timeless elegance.
description: A timeless heirloom piece showcasing the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry design. The combination of high-quality emeralds and uncut Polki diamonds exudes opulence and sophistication. This Panakala Haaram is a symbol of prosperity and marital bliss, making it an exceptional addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and enhances the overall beauty of the piece.
